GSD.description:
KVM: avoid NULL pointer dereference in kvm_dirty_ring_push

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit 226b4327ef5c88572fc12187193f1b5073c10837. For more details please see the references link.
